cards.title: task 1
cards.description: Implement a ReactJS web page with two columns and multiple cards (at least 2 cards)

cards.title: task 2
cards.description: All data should come from a JSON data file

cards.title: task 3
cards.description: Card face should only display Title and Owner

cards.title: task 4
cards.description: Cards should be able to move between columns and within each column (order changes)

cards.title: task 5
cards.description: Users should be able to look at the web app on a small, medium and large viewport
